ARABIC: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have placed a barrier in front of them and a barrier behind them, blindfolding them so that they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We shall raise a barrier in front of them and a barrier behind them, and cover them over so that they will not be able to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We have put a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, and have covered them up, so they are unable to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have set-up a barrier in front of and behind them and have made them blind. Thus, they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have set a wall before them and a wall behind them, and covered the top – so they are unable to see anything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have put a barrier before them, and a barrier behind them, and We have covered them up, so that they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We have made before them a barrier and a barrier behind them, then We have covered them over so that they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier; and We have covered them, so they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have set a bar before them and a bar behind them, and (thus) have covered them so that they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We have set a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, and We have covered them up so that they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have placed before them a barrier and behind them a barrier, so We have covered them, so that they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We have put a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, then We have blind-folded them, so they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We have put a bar in front of them and a bar behind them, and further, We have covered them up; so that they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have put a barrier before them, and a barrier behind them, and We have covered them up, so that they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have set a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, and, We have covered them so that they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We placed a barrier in front of them, and a barrier behind them, and We have enshrouded them, so they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:9] And We have set before them a barrier (read saddan or suddan in both instances) and behind them a barrier; so We have covered them, so they do not see — this is also figurative, depicting the way in which the paths of faith are closed to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We have set a bar) a veil (before them) of the matter of the Hereafter (and a bar) a veil (behind them) of the matter of this worldly life, (and (thus) have covered them) covered the insight of their hearts (so that they see not) the Truth and guidance; it is also said that this means: We have set a veil before them when they were about to stone the Prophet (pbuh) while he was praying, such that they did not see him; and We set behind them a veil so that they do not see the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh); and because of this veil they were not able to see the Prophet (pbuh) or consequently harm him.
